publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-317 Iain Gray: Carers' Strategy—That the Parliament welcomes the Executive’s commitment in its Programme for Government to introduce a Carer’s Strategy for Scotland to assist unpaid carers, and approves the Executive’s proposals for that strategy. Supported by: Susan Deacon
S1M-317 Carers’ Strategy (lodged on 23 November 1999) Mr Michael McMahon*
